name: kitsun (IN DEVELOPMENT)
description:
CREATED FOR "MY FIRST GAME JAM: SUMMER 2022", KITSUN IS A SHORT RPG.

YOU PLAY AS A FOX, NICKNAMED "KIT", WHO FINDS THEMSELVES DEFENDING A VILLAGE FROM A DEADLY PLAGUE.

EXPLORE THE FOREST IN SEARCH OF A CURE.

multiple endings planned

easter eggs ahoy

please note this project is unfinished, and as a result only one ending is available.

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS: unzip file and run game.exe. this will be changed in the full release.
